lines.text: And if you tell the paper, I'll make sure you're headline in news, in the obituaries.
[Gunther needs directions from the Oriental milkman]
Hi, can you tell me where Mapleson street is?

[clearer and louder]
Can you tell me where Mapleson street is?
Ohhh, Mapleson street, why didn't you say so? Speak clear English next time, okay?
That's what I'm gonna tell your parents when you don't come home tonight!
Empty? I just put two bucks in this thing!
